summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Ucycle app comprehensive update. All requested features verified: 105km default radius, 5-200km slider range with step 5, nearby count badge, toast notifications at center-middle (40vh) with 1.2s duration, scrap prices menu geo-gated to Sydney Metro, Norman Scrap Yard with White Goods, SCRAP_PRICES with 8 materials, and menu drawer with 60vh height.

issues: Console warnings about missing DialogTitle and aria-describedby for accessibility - minor accessibility improvement needed (same as iteration 7)

SCRAP_PRICES array has 8 materials with White Goods at bottom (lines 831-840)
Toaster configured with position='top-center' duration={1200} toastOptions={{ style: { marginTop: '40vh' } }} (line 2942)

context_for_next_testing_agent: All Ucycle comprehensive update features verified. Key implementation locations: (1) radiusKm default 105 at line 245, (2) Radius slider 5-200km step 5 at lines 1719-1723, (3) isInSydneyMetro() 300km geofencing at lines 785-791, (4) SCRAP_PRICES 8 materials at lines 831-840, (5) Toaster center-middle 1.2s at line 2942, (6) Menu drawer 60vh at line 1981, (7) Norman Scrap Yard White Goods at line 814.
